TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChartArea3DStyle extends System.Object

summary.span: 管理三维 (3D) 图表区域的显示特性。

span.span: Manages the display attributes for three-dimensional (3D) chart areas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供三维图表区的样式，并使用属性进行公开 。This class provides the styles for 3D chart areas, and is exposed using the property. 若要为图表区域启用3D，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To enable 3D for a chart area, set the property to `true`. 这会导致三维应用于图表区域中绘制的所有数据系列。This causes 3D to be applied to all data series drawn in a chart area. 通过将 属性设置为 `true` （默认值），可以显示图表区域的等重投影。An isometric projection of a chart area can be displayed by setting the property to `true`, which is the default. 等轴视图不是实际的3D，因为旋转显示角度可能与垂直轴和水平轴绕旋转的实际角度不匹配。Isometric views are not actually 3D, because the displayed angles of rotation may not match the actual angles of rotation around the vertical and horizontal axes. 实际角度 分别使用和属性来控制 。The actual angles are controlled using the and properties, respectively. 有关等轴投影的详细信息，请参阅属性的 "备注" 部分 。For more information about isometric projections, see the Remarks section of the property. 你还可以使用此类来执行以下操作：You can also use this class to: - 使用属性的分类条形图和柱形图数据系列 。Cluster bar and column chart data series using the property. - 使用属性控制光照效果 。Control the lighting effects using the property. - 使用属性设置图表区墙的宽度 。Set the width of chart area walls using the property. - 设置此属性的透视图量 。Set the amount of perspective with the property. - 分别使用和属性控制数据点的深度和数据行之间的 距离 。Control the depth of data points and the distance between data rows using the and properties, respectively. - 使用和属性旋转图表区 。Rotate a chart area using the and properties. 若要使用三维点的坐标，请使用 类。To work with coordinates of 3D points, use the class. 当图表设置为三维时，以下图表功能无效：When a chart is set to 3D, the following chart features are not valid: - 刻度分隔线Scale breaks - 渐变Gradients - 滚动和缩放Scrolling and zooming

summary.span: 获取或设置切换图表区域三维效果开与关的标志。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that toggles the 3D on and off for a chart area.

value.span: 如果图表区域使用三维显示，则为 ，如果图表区域使用二维显示，则为 。

span.span: the chart area is displayed using 3D, if the chart area is displayed in 2D.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 切换图表区域的三维显示。Toggles the three-dimensional display of a chart area.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定条形图或柱形图的数据系列是否为簇状；即，沿非重复行显示。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether data series for a bar or column chart are clustered; that is, displayed along distinct rows.

value.span: 如果条形图或柱形图的数据系列为簇状，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if whether data series for a bar or column chart are clustered; otherwise, .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定图表区域是否使用等角投影显示。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether a chart area is displayed using an isometric projection.

value.span: 如果图表区域使用等角投影显示，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the chart area is displayed using an isometric projection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 等轴视图不是实际的3D，因为旋转显示角度可能与垂直轴和水平轴绕旋转的实际角度不匹配。Isometric views are not actually 3D, because the displayed angles of rotation may not match the actual angles of rotation around the vertical and horizontal axes. 实际角度 分别使用和属性来控制 。The actual angles are controlled using the and properties, respectively. 请注意以下有关等轴投影的要点：Note the following points concerning isometric projection: - 它不是 "真实" 三维。It is not "real" 3D. 也就是说，绕轴旋转的角度不会使用真正的旋转角度。That is, the angle of rotation around axes doesn't use true rotational angles. - 它非常适合用一些深度显示三维图表。It is ideal for displaying 3D charts with some depth. - 如果你的应用程序允许最终用户旋转图表，旋转将不会平滑。If your application allows end-users to rotate the charts, the rotation will not be smooth. 在这种情况下，不建议使用等轴视图。In this case, using isometric views is not recommended. - 对于等轴投影，不支持透视。With isometric projection, perspective is not supported.

summary.span: 获取或设置三维图表区域的照明样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of lighting for a 3D chart area.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，指定三维图表区域的光照样式。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the style of lighting for a 3D chart area.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Perspective { int get(); void set(int value); };

[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置三维图表区域的透视百分比。

span.span: Gets or sets the percent of perspective for a 3D chart area.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示三维图表区域的透视百分比。

span.span: An value that represents the percent of perspective for a 3D chart area.

value.span: 允许的范围为 0-100%，默认值为百分之零 (0%)。

span.span: The allowable range is 0-100 percent, and the default is zero (0) percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不平行于投影平面的任何平行线集的透视投影将汇聚到没影点。A perspective projection of any set of parallel lines that are not parallel to the projection plane converges to a vanishing point. 如果设置了 属性，则 属性将自动设置为 `false` ，因为这些属性是互斥的。If you set the property, the property will be automatically set to `false`, because these properties are mutually exclusive.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PointDepth { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PointDepth : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置三维图表区域中显示的数据点的深度。

span.span: Gets or sets the depth of data points displayed in a 3D chart area.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示数据点的深度。

span.span: An value that represents the depth of data points.
The allowable range is 0-1000 percent.
The default is 100 percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定数据点的深度，以数据点宽度的百分比表示。This property determines the depth of data points, and is represented as a percentage of the data point width. 属性只能应用于条形图、柱形图、折线图、饼图和样条图数据点的深度。The property can be applied to the depth of bar, column, line, pie and spline chart data points only. 如果为其他图表类型设置此属性 (例如，气泡图和点图) 不能将其点深度 "拉伸"，它将为数据点保留额外的空间，但不会增加其深度。If you set this property for other chart types (for example, bubble and point charts) that cannot have their point depths "stretched", it will reserve extra space for the data points, but will not increase their depth. 可以通过将 属性设置为 `true` （默认值），将该图表显示为等角投影。You can display the chart as an isometric projection by setting the property to `true`, which is the default value. 这会使点深度看起来比此属性设置的百分比更多或更少，这取决于所显示的图表。This will cause the point depth to appear to be more or less than the percentage set by this property, depending on the chart being displayed. 若要控制数据行之间的间距，请使用 属性。To control the spacing between rows of data, use the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PointGapDepth { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PointGapDepth : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置三维图表区域中序列行之间的距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between series rows in a 3D chart area.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示三维图表区域中数据行（即数据序列）之间的距离。

span.span: An value that represents the distance between data rows (that is, the data series) in the 3D chart area.

value.span: 允许的范围为 0-1000%，默认值为 100%。

span.span: The allowable range is 0-1000 percent, and the default is 100 percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定数据行之间的距离，每行对应一个数据序列。This property determines the distance between data rows, with each row corresponding to a data series. 度量单位表示为一行中数据点之间的距离的百分比。The unit of measurement is expressed as a percentage of the distance between data points in one row. 使用自定义属性更改列和条形图类型的列或条形之间的间距 `PointWidth` 将影响 属性值。Changing the gap between columns or bars for column and bar chart types using the `PointWidth` custom property will affect the property value. 将 属性设置为 `true` (默认值) 以便将图表显示为等角投影。Set the property to `true` (the default value) to display the chart as an isometric projection. 这会使点间隙深度看起来比此属性设置的百分比更多或更少，这取决于所显示的图表。This will cause the point gap depth to appear to be more or less than the percentage set by this property, depending on the chart being displayed. 若要控制数据点的深度，请使用 属性。To control the depth of data points, use the property.

span.span: Gets or sets the angle of rotation around the vertical axes for 3D chart areas.

summary.span: 获取或设置三维图表区域中显示的墙的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the walls displayed in a 3D chart area.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示三维图表区域中显示的墙的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: An value that represents the width, in pixels, of the walls displayed in a 3D chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定了在三维图表区域中显示的墙壁 (例如，背面墙、侧墙等) 。This property determines the width of the walls (for example, the back wall, side walls, and so forth) that are displayed in 3D chart areas. 允许的范围为0-30 像素。The allowable range is 0-30 pixels.
